Psalms__115.1: I have believed, therefore have I spoken; but I have been humbled exceedingly.
Psalms__115.2: I said in my excess: Every man is a liar.
Psalms__115.3: What shall I render to the Lord, for all the things he hath rendered unto me?
Psalms__115.4: I will take the chalice of salvation; and I will call upon the name of the Lord.
Psalms__115.5: I will pay my vows to the Lord before all his people:
Psalms__115.6: Precious in the sight of the Lord is the death of his saints.
Psalms__115.7: O Lord, for I am thy servant: I am thy servant, and the son of thy handmaid. Thou hast broken my bonds:
Psalms__115.8: I will sacrifice to thee the sacrifice of praise, and I will call upon the name of the Lord.
Psalms__115.9: I will pay my vows to the Lord in the sight of all his people:
Psalms__115.10: In the courts of the house of the Lord, in the midst of thee, O Jerusalem.
